body.name: Montessori Bookshelf - Book Display Shelf for Toddler - Forward/Front Facing Bookcase Rack Display
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 17 mins
features: ENCOURAGE CHILD INDEPENDENCE: The Montessori & Me Front-Facing Bookshelf beautifully displays the covers of your child’s favorite or new books, giving them the freedom to explore those that they find most interesting! Better yet, non-readers can also greatly benefit from the insight into the content of the books based on the cover images!

PROMOTE EARLY READING: Children are naturally drawn to images and pictures on the covers of books, so why keep them hidden with a traditional bookshelf? Instead, showcase engaging and colorful book covers using this Front-Facing Bookshelf to encourage and pique your child’s interest in reading from an early age!

NEW AND IMPROVED DESIGN: Our Front-Facing Bookshelf has been redesigned with much deeper shelves to ensure that all of your children's books stay in place! Now you can enjoy using this bookshelf for ALL children's books, small and large without worrying about them toppling over!

QUALITY & LONGEVITY: Crafted from a natural hardwood and designed with interlocking joints, this Front-Facing Bookshelf is built to last! The protective child-safe lacquer coating ensures a smooth and durable finish to keep up with even the wildest daily rough and tumble!

SAFETY GUARANTEED: As with all Montessori & Me materials, this Front-Facing Bookshelf has passed rigorous compliance testing at a CPSC-Accepted laboratory and conforms with all federally regulated safety standards, ensuring that this material is 100% baby and kid-safe!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Is there any issue with the books toppling or falling off the shelf? NO! Our new and improved late 2023 design now features deeper topple-free shelves that securely hold children's books, both small and large! How many books can this bookshelf hold? Each level holds two standard-sized or three smaller children's books so in total, anywhere between 10 and 15 books. Why use a front-facing bookshelf? Front-facing bookshelves provide a visual display of the book covers, thus encouraging independence and exploration as children are invited to choose books that interest them. Does the bookshelf require assembly? Yes, the bookshelf is flat-packed to minimize costs and requires assembly using the included tools and hardware.

Development Target Independence, Early Reading, Organization, Decision-Making Special Feature Toppling-Proof Front-Facing Bookshelf with Reinforced Interlocking Joints and Deep-Shelf Design. Product size 11 x 17.5 x 17 Inches - 12 pounds Manufacturer Montessori & Me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Montessori bookshelf for babies/toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: It was so hard to find a Montessori bookshelf for my baby’s nursery and I’m so glad Montessori & Me designed this perfect bookshelf! It holds the right amount of books that gives plenty options but not overwhelming for kids. The size is compact so it doesn’t take too much room and the height is great for little ones to reach. Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Very reasonable price for the high quality wood and considerate design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love this! It’s super cute, very nice quality and perfect size for babies and toddlers. Definitely recommend to secure it to the wall

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but impractical
reviews.reviewText: First the good:Its beautifulThe quality of the wood is greatIt was packed well with each individual piece wrapped to avoid scratchesEasy to put together but a little time consuming if put together by one person. It would have been a fast build if I had someone to hold the pieces for me while I screwed it in.The bad:Only one real con but its a huge one... the shelves are incredibly shallow so every tile a book is pulled off the shelf and lightly bumps another book they all come toppling over. If you care how your kids space looks you will constantly be putting every book back on the shelf.As much as I love how it looks I will have to send it back as it won't work for our needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddler
reviews.reviewText: Never left a review before but felt like I should with this shelf. Great quality and easy to assemble. It’s going to be perfect for my daughters bedroom. The shelves are on the small side, so it probably wouldn’t fit large books but it’s great for boars books. Nice solid wood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, solid bookcase
reviews.reviewText: This bookcase is on the small size, holds about 12 cardboard books, doesn't tip easily...a really good feature because the minis favorite right now is taking all the books off so she can step up it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The books don’t stay up?
reviews.reviewText: The shelf is a good quality wood but once we built it and put some books in it they didn’t stay up… they all started to fall over. I don’t see this being a convenient way of organizing books

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality. Easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: Great book shelf. Perfect for my little one who just turned 12 months and is really interested in books right now. The quality is spot on and my husband took less than 30 minutes to put it together. He said it was super easy and the tool that came with it worked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off my saying this bookshelf is so beautiful! The first thing I noticed when we opened the box was the quality of the wood. Everything looks as though it was meticulously hand picked when designing to make sure the quality of this bookshelf was a priority. Putting it together was easy to follow and quick. We put it in our soon to be nursery and it was the perfect size! It’s heavier and sturdy so I know my baby will be safe when she eventually climbs/uses it to stand up to pick out her books! Love that it promotes independence and options as well. I would love to buy another for my toddler- he loves it as well!
